revised_title: Nonlinearization of Maxwell's Equations and 3-Soliton Solutions
tldr: The authors propose a new nonlinearization of Maxwell's pure field equations, introducing 3-soliton solutions that are strictly 3-localized and satisfy Planck's relation and the relativistic integral relation for massless particles. This approach aims to provide a clearer mathematical image of single photons and improve the understanding of electromagnetic fields as collections of non-interacting, time-stable objects.
